mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( store_id, item_name, image_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{storeId}, #{itemName}, #{imageId}, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item i JOIN stock s ON s.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN buffer b ON b.item_id = i.item_id
i.store_id = #{storeId} AND i.is_active = b'1'
AND i.is_pinned = 1
AND s.stock_amount < b.buffer_amount
AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM request r WHERE r.item_id = i.item_id AND r.is_active = b'1' AND r.request_status NOT IN ('CANCEL','DONE','CONFIRM') )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT MAX(l.created_at) AS last_inout FROM log l WHERE l.item_id = i.item_id AND l.log_type IN ('IN','OUT') ) t WHERE t.last_inout < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) )
AND i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT i.item_id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, s.stock_id AS stockId, s.stock_amount AS stockAmount, s.is_pinned AS isPinned, im.path AS imageUrl, r.request_type AS latestRequestType FROM item i JOIN stock s ON s.item_id = i.item_id
LEFT JOIN image im ON im.image_id = i.image_id AND im.is_active = b'1'
LEFT JOIN buffer b ON b.item_id = i.item_id
LEFT JOIN request r ON r.request_id = ( SELECT r2.request_id FROM request r2 WHERE r2.item_id = i.item_id AND r2.is_active = b'1' AND r2.request_status NOT IN ('CANCEL','DONE','CONFIRM') ORDER BY r2.request_date DESC, r2.created_at DESC LIMIT 1 )
i.store_id = #{storeId} AND i.is_active = b'1'
AND i.is_pinned = 1
AND s.stock_amount < b.buffer_amount
AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM request r3 WHERE r3.item_id = i.item_id AND r3.is_active = b'1' AND r3.request_status NOT IN ('CANCEL','DONE','CONFIRM') )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT MAX(l.created_at) AS last_inout FROM log l WHERE l.item_id = i.item_id AND l.log_type IN ('IN','OUT') ) t WHERE t.last_inout < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) )
AND i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY i.item_id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT i.item_id AS itemId, s.stock_id AS stockId, i.item_name AS itemName, s.stock_amount AS stockAmount, s.is_pinned AS isPinned, im.path AS imageUrl, b.buffer_amount AS bufferAmount, l.log_type AS lastLogType, l.created_at AS lastLogAt
